name: SayNo
0:
”Alexa open say no.”
”Alexa launch say no.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: say no
des:
Are you tired of saying no? Use this skill to have Alexa say no for you!

This skill will say "no" with absolute certainty so that you finally get your point across. If you have someone constantly making unreasonable or repetitive requests, this skill is for you! Try it out!

To use, simply say, "Alexa open Say No!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
